TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示使用屬性組件 (Assembly) 為主要 Interop 組件。

span.span: Indicates that the attributed assembly is a primary interop assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至組件，，雖然[Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)通常會套用它為您匯入類型程式庫時。You can apply this attribute to assemblies, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it imports a type library. Interop 組件包含描述現有的 COM 類型，通常已在 COM 類型程式庫中所述的中繼資料。An interop assembly contains metadata that describes existing COM types, which are often already described in a COM type library. Tlbimp.exe 會產生 interop 組件從 COM 類型程式庫。Tlbimp.exe produces interop assemblies from COM type libraries. Interop 組件時，通常只包含中繼資料 （無程式碼）。Interop assemblies typically only contain metadata (no code). 主要 interop 組件是由相同的發行者，它們會描述，並提供該型別程式庫中的正式定義的類型定義的類型程式庫所提供。Primary interop assemblies are provided by the same publisher as the type library they describe, and provide the official definitions of the types defined with that type library. 若要確保唯一性，主要 interop 組件永遠會簽署其發行者。Primary interop assemblies are always signed by their publisher to ensure uniqueness. 您可以透過下列方式，從類型程式庫產生主要 interop 組件：You can generate a primary interop assembly from a type library in the following ways: - 執行與 TlbImp.exe`/primary`從命令列選項。Run TlbImp.exe with the `/primary` option from the command line. - 套用在設計階段。Apply the at design time. 若要指定主要 interop 組件 managed 的程式碼中，您必須套用和在設計階段組件。To specify a primary interop assembly in managed source code, you must apply the and to the assembly at design time. 上的主要 interop 組件識別的類型程式庫的 LIBID 和識別這個組件的主要 interop 組件的特定型別程式庫的版本。The on the primary interop assembly identifies the LIBID of the type library and the identifies the version of the particular type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly. 可以出現多次，如果組件相同的型別程式庫的多個版本的主要 interop 組件。The can appear multiple times if the assembly is the primary interop assembly for multiple versions of the same type library. 使用類型程式庫中定義的類型時，一律會參考該型別程式庫，而不重新匯入或重新定義的型別本身的主要 interop 組件。When using the types defined in a type library, always reference the primary interop assembly for that type library, rather than reimporting or redefining the types themselves. 如需指導方針和有關如何產生，或使用主要 interop 組件的程序，請參閱[Primary Interop Assemblies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b977a8be-59a0-40a0-a806-b11ffba5c080(v=vs.100))。For guidelines and procedures on how to produce or use primary interop assemblies, see [Primary Interop Assemblies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b977a8be-59a0-40a0-a806-b11ffba5c080(v=vs.100)). 類型程式庫匯入程序的詳細說明，請參閱 < [ 型別程式庫至組件轉換的摘要](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf3f90c5-4770-4ab8-895c-3ba1055cc958(v=vs.100))。For a detailed description of the type library importing process, see [Type Library to Assembly Conversion Summary](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf3f90c5-4770-4ab8-895c-3ba1055cc958(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 major, int32 minor) cil managed
Public Sub New (major As Integer, minor As Integer)

param.name: major
param.span: 型別程式庫的主要版本，其中的組件為主要 Interop 組件。

span.span: The major version of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

param.name: minor
param.span: 型別程式庫的次要版本，其中的組件為主要 Interop 組件。

span.span: The minor version of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

summary.span: 使用組件為主要 Interop 組件的型別程式庫主要和次要版本號碼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the major and minor version numbers of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以出現多次，如果組件相同的型別程式庫的多個版本的主要 interop 組件。The can appear multiple times if the assembly is the primary interop assembly for multiple versions of the same type library.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MajorVersion As Integer
public: property int MajorVersion { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得型別程式庫主要版本號碼，其中的組件為主要 Interop 組件。

span.span: Gets the major version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

value.span: 型別程式庫的主要版本號碼，其中的組件為主要 Interop 組件。

span.span: The major version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MinorVersion As Integer
public: property int MinorVersion { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得型別程式庫次要版本號碼，其中的組件為主要 Interop 組件。

span.span: Gets the minor version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.

value.span: 型別程式庫的次要版本號碼，其中的組件為主要 Interop 組件。

span.span: The minor version number of the type library for which this assembly is the primary interop assembly.
